unnormalised: Hey, just wanted to know if anyone faced issues linking their PAN no. to their bank account recently? My banker is saying the IFSC code on my account isn't matching the records, even though it's correct. My CIF number is also fine, I double checked. Maybe it's a glitch with the new RBI guidelines? Anyone else experiencing this?
normalised: Hey, just wanted to know if anyone faced issues linking their P-A-N number to their bank account recently? My banker is saying the I-F-S-C code on my account isn't matching the records, even though it's correct. My C-I-F number is also fine, I double checked. Maybe it's a glitch with the new R-B-I guidelines? Anyone else experiencing this?
